title: Good Bars of the World
name: Good Bars of the World
description:
A Map by Carsonspost

A public map. Post your favorite bars, pubs, and other alcoholic establishments.

properties.name: Bar Atlantico
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostWhile most "American" style bars overseas are pretty overdone, this is a good one. So whenever there\'s an US navy boat in, best avoided. Otherwise, a good place for a drink.

properties.name: Cafe Limon
properties.description: Posted by Carsonspost If its still there, its a great place for music and drink.

properties.name: Dicks Place
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostActually a resort and timeshare area, but the bar is an excellent place to have a drink.

properties.name: Ed's Bar
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostIn downtown Nandi, its a great bar with the best of Top 40 music (from six months ago). Mind the pool tables, not as flat as they used to be. Excellent place for an evening. Restaurant earlier on, dancefloor later.

properties.name: HQ
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostPretty good bar, good pizzas. Great barmaid hiring policy.

properties.name: Hogans Pub
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostHogans Irish Pub, a great pub. Live music Thursday.

properties.name: Le Happy, Creperie and Bar
properties.description: Posted by Jason 1011 Northwest 16th Avenue, Portland, OR, 97209tinfoil sculptures, white trash crepes and very warm. Small and cozy.

properties.name: Le Mercure
properties.description: Posted by Grahamlauren  84 rue Pixerecourt, Paris, FranceChez Kamel is the best neighborhood bar anywhere.

properties.name: Swashbucklers
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostReally dodgy bar next to a great seafood restaurant. The pub grub in here is great. Fantastically tasteless fishing junk for decor.

properties.name: The Corner Bar
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostMatt and Penny\'s bar is always pretty busy after work, Fridays and Saturday nights or when there is sport on.

properties.name: The Cricketer
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostStrange place, an old pub in an old building. Pub quiz Thursday.

properties.name: The Porter and Sorter
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostNice spot. Next to a post office sorting depot, which is where it gets its name. Busy on a Friday but otherwise a pretty good spot to get a beer.

properties.name: Three Needs
properties.description: Posted by Infojunkie 207 College St, Burlington, VT

properties.name: Vermont Pub & Brewery
properties.description: Posted by Infojunkie  144 College St, Burlington, VT
